name: lambda-ifttt-listener-gleam
description: Listens to ifttt webhook and imports a gleam competition.
author: Michael Bausano

scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-ifttt-listener-gleam --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/scraper_lambda --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-ifttt-listener-gleam --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/scraper_lambda --config claudia-prod.json
